text: Hagi Jeremaiaga antahio, mago rankumamofoma hanave vihu keginama hu kagizankna hu'na kagrira menina kazeri hanavenetina, aenireti fumaza zafa retru rentazankna kagrira nehu'na, bronsireti kuma kegina hugagi zankna hugahue. Ana hanugenka kagra oti hankave ti'nesanke'za, maka ama ana mopafi vahemo'zane Juda kini vahemo'zane, kva vahemo'zane, pristi vahemo'zane, Juda vahe'mo'zanena kazeri fenkami otregahaze.
